markdownRemark.html:
Recently I came across an interesting problem of building an API rate limiter. While there are a lot of system design blog posts on the same topic. I will try to explain an alternative approach here. https://medium.com/@saisandeepmopuri/system-design-rate-limiter-and-data-modelling-9304b0d18250
